siteOptions.blogdescription: Demonstrating WordPress Block Templates with Podcast Block Bindings

steps.code:
<?php
// Set up podcast options
update_option('ss_podcasting_data_description', 'Welcome to the Gutenberg Times Podcast - your source for the latest WordPress block editor news, tips, and tutorials.');
update_option('ss_podcasting_data_image', 'https://picsum.photos/400/400?random=1');
echo 'Podcast options configured';
?>

<?php
// Create sample podcast posts
for ($i = 1; $i <= 3; $i++) {
    $post_id = wp_insert_post(array(
        'post_title' => 'Episode ' . $i . ': Block Editor Updates',
        'post_content' => 'In this episode, we discuss the latest WordPress block editor updates, new features, and how block bindings revolutionize dynamic content.',
        'post_excerpt' => 'Latest WordPress block editor news for Episode ' . $i,
        'post_type' => 'podcast',
        'post_status' => 'publish'
    ));
    
    if ($post_id) {
        update_post_meta($post_id, 'date_recorded', date('Y-m-d', strtotime('-' . ($i * 7) . ' days')));
        update_post_meta($post_id, 'audio_file', 'https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/BabyElephantWalk60.wav');
        update_post_meta($post_id, 'cover_image_id', 1);
    }
}
echo 'Created 3 sample podcast episodes';
?>
